snippet: Lindsey Vonn will test her injured right knee with a training run in advance of this weekend’s World Cup event in Lake Louise, Canada.
abstract: Lindsey Vonn will test her injured right knee with a training run in advance of upcoming World Cup event in Lake Louise, Canada.
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn will test her injured right knee with a training run in advance of this weekend’s World Cup event in Lake Louise, Canada.
